articles.title: Jackson carries NC A&T past Md.-Eastern Shore 91-53
articles.description: PRINCESS ANNE, Md. (AP) — Ronald Jackson had a season-high 22 points plus 12 rebounds as NC A&T ended its eight-game road losing streak, routing Maryland-Eastern Shore 91-53 on Saturday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Agosto lifts LIU-Brooklyn past Fairleigh Dickinson 84-70
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Jashaun Agosto had 20 points as Long Island-Brooklyn topped Fairleigh Dickinson 84-70 on Saturday.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) Jashaun Agosto had 20 points as Long Island-Brooklyn topped Fairleigh Dickinson 84-70 on Saturday.
Agosto hit 9 of 11 shots.

articles.description: ELON, N.C. (AP) — Zac Ervin scored a season-high 27 points, draining seven 3-pointers, and Elon ran away from UNC Wilmington 80-63 on Saturday.

articles.title: LeBron James out against Thunder with illness
articles.description: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — LeBron James will miss the Lakers' game against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Saturday with an illness.
articles.content:
OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) LeBron James will miss the Lakers' game against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Saturday with an illness.
Lakers coach Frank Vogel said James has a chest cold. Officially, the team said he has flu-like symptoms.
